# Primary Tracts

:::{layout-ncol="3"}

### Lateral Corticospinal Tract (LCST)

[Lateral Corticospinal Tract (LCST)]({{< var ref-lateral-corticospinal-tract.path >}})

- [Voluntary movement]({{< var ref-movement-system.voluntary >}}) of extremities @osullivanPhysicalRehabilitation2019

### Medial Corticospinal Tract (ACST)

[Medial Corticospinal Tract (MCST)]({{< var ref-medial-corticospinal-tract.path >}})

- [Voluntary movement]({{< var ref-movement-system.voluntary >}}) of axial muscles @osullivanPhysicalRehabilitation2019



### Medial Vestibulospinal tract

Medial vestibulospinal tract

- (positioning of head and neck)

### Lateral & Medial Vestibulospinal Tracts

Lateral and medial vestibulospinal tracts work together to achieve posture and balance @osullivanNationalPhysicalTherapy2022.

### Lateral and medial Reticulspinal Tract

The lateral and medial reticulospinal tracts work together to perform:
    - Posture @osullivanPhysicalRehabilitation2019
    - Balance @osullivanPhysicalRehabilitation2019
    - Automatic gait related movements @osullivanPhysicalRehabilitation2019

### Rubrospinal Tract

- Movement of limbs @osullivanPhysicalRehabilitation2019
